#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    //scanf("%d",&t);
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int m,n,i,j,k;
        long long int res=0;
        //scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
        scanint(m);
        scanint(n);
        if(m==1&&n==1)
        {
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        if(m==1)
        {
            res=2+(n-2)*2;
            printf("%lld\n",res);
            continue;
        }
        if(n==1)
        {
            res=2+(m-2)*2;
            printf("%lld\n",res);
            continue;
        }
        res=12+5*(2*m+2*n-8)+8*(m*n-2*m-2*n+4);
        printf("%lld\n",res);
    }
    return 0;
}
